entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Princeton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:46 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Princeton Airport 10:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: 0.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: -0.4°C
Wind: WSW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Snow level near valley bottom. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
